EmailTemplate.description: RING DNA Template Con ED Follow Up
EmailTemplate.name: ConEd Lost Customer Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: ACV Enviro – checking in
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
I’m writing to follow up on my previous email to you regarding our past service. I do not mean to pry, but I would sincerely appreciate any feedback you may have.
Please let me know if you may have a moment to catch up today.
Thank You,
